name: International Conference On Smart Technologies For Smart Nation (SmartTechCon2017)
content: IEEE Technically Co-Sponsored International Conference On Smart Technologies For Smart Nation (SmartTechCon2017) will be held at REVA University, Bengaluru, India from 17-19 August 2017\. This conference will feature a comprehensive technical program including several special sessions/symposiums and a number of short courses. The goal of SmartTechCon2017 is to provide an outstanding forum for researchers, practitioners, policy makers, and users to exchange ideas, techniques and tools, raise awareness, and share experience related to all practical and theoretical aspects of Smart Technologies.
